About me

I 

Design, photography, travels, ride my fixed gear, music (Hip Hop), movies (Tarantino, Martin Scorsese)

I'm a creative designer & developer who works to create beautiful and high quality digital experiences

UX/UI designer & full-stack developer, I have an extensive experience in web and mobile development using HTML4/5, CSS, PHP, JavaScript.
Moreover, I acquired a global vision of the creative digital production: team management, web branding, creative direction, interactive concept, UI / UX design, accessibility, ergonomics, web standards, responsive webdesign and webApp.
For more information, download my resume.
